archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0646
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The Collections solution shall enable customer segments to be created Segments include: 1. Pre-delinquent, Collections, Recoveries 2. EG, SME, SOHO, Consumer and Wholesale MVNO 3. Customer profiles (from customer intelligence data)

properties.value: Can you please explain what do you mean by "pre-delinquent, Collections, Recoveries"? Can you please explain role of customer profiles in Collections solution? Based on customer profile Collection solution will have to use dedicated scenario? Workshop answers: Pre-delinquent - just about to get into collections. Predelinquent customer used to pay after receiving some notifications, rarely on time Collections - Customer with debt, being processed by collection mechanism Recoveries - already terminated, but trying to recover money (by DCA)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
